farewell.message:
We are sad to see you go, {{username}}!

We will make sure we remove your account and data from Nuclia. On behalf of Nuclia’s team, we thank you for the time you invested in our platform.

If you think we could have done something better, please let us know. We would love to hear from you.

Thank you!
farewell.title: See you soon 👋

quickstart.complete_steps: Complete the steps below to take full advantage of Nuclia’s features!
quickstart.task1.title: Sign Up
quickstart.task2.title: First PDF Upload
quickstart.task3.title: Watch tutorial video
quickstart.task4.description:
Use the “Content Options” in the menu to upload:
• 1 document (Word or PDF)
• 1 media file (audio or video) in English, Spanish, French, German, Catalan or Italian
• 1 link
quickstart.task4.title: Upload 3 files (1 minute)
quickstart.task5.description:
Check the processing status of your files.
Once your files are processed use the search bar to find results.
quickstart.task5.title: Make 3 searches (2 minutes)
quickstart.task6.description: Use your API Key to make 3 queries to the API.
quickstart.task6.title: Make 3 API Calls (2 minutes)
quickstart.task7.description: Let a developer know about Nuclia
quickstart.task7.title: Spread the word
quickstart.title: Quick start

setup.account_preferences: 1. Let’s start with your account preferences
setup.data_storage: Where do you want to host your data?
setup.kb_created: A Knowledge box — where indexing data is stored — will be created.
setup.knowledge_box_creation: We will create a Knowledge Box using your account’s name. It will be used to store initial data. Data will be processed in the zone you select.
stash.contact_admin: You are not authorized to create a knowledge box. Contact your administrator.
stash.create.anonymization-help: Apply General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) compliant anonymization to all resources in the Knowledge Box
stash.create.anonymization-warning: Anonymization will only affect the new data that is entered.
stash.create.error: Something went wrong when creating the knowledge box. Please try again.
stash.create.failure: Something is wrong at the moment. Contact your administrator.
stash.create.language.mono-help: Choose the language of the documentation in this knowledge box
stash.create.languages-help: Select if information that will be uploaded to the KB will be in one or more languages. If there’s only one language, select that for improved accuracy.

stash.delete.error: Error when creating the knowledge box
stash.delete.warning: If you delete the Knowledge Box {{ kb }}, all data will also be deleted

stash.invited_user: We have sent an invitation email to {{user}} to join this knowledge box.

stash.no_knowledge_boxes: There are no knowledge boxes in this account

stash.publish.error: Error when publishing the Knowledge Box
stash.publish.title: Publish knowledge box
stash.publish.warning: If you publish the "{{ kb }}" Knowledge Box, all the information in it will be public.

stash.retire.warning: If you unpublish the "{{ kb }}" Knowledge Box, all the information in it will become private.

stash.service_access_description: Important! Copy and save the Token code. It will disappear once added.
stash.settings.processes.classifier.info: In order to get accurate label search suggestions, existing content has to be labeled. As more content is labeled, training will improve. You can create new labels and classifications from the ontology page.
stash.settings.processes.labeller.info: In order to label sentences automatically, existing content has to be labeled. As more content is labeled, training will improve. You can create new labels and classifications from the ontology page.
stash.settings.processes.training.active: There is an active training that you can stop at any time. You will receive an email when it is complete.
stash.settings.processes.training.agreem: I accept the charges incurred by selecting this option
stash.settings.processes.training.not-al: The training feature is not available on basic accounts.
stash.settings.processes.training.time_r: The time required to train is about {{hours}} hours which will be subtracted from the available hours.
stash.title: Title of the box
stash.upload_to_search: Upload data to start using the AI-search engine.
stash.users.title: Users

stash.valid_domains_label: Domains from which email can be sent
stash.valid_emails: Add, separated by comas, the emails addresses from witch emails will be accepted.
stash.widgets.add-help: Name your widget to save it
stash.widgets.publish_kb: You can publish it from the

stats.total.title: Total number of resources
tasks.credits.title: Available cycles
tour.step1.content: In just a few steps, you’ll learn how Nuclia works, so you can start supercharging your application!
tour.step1.title: Let’s tell you about Nuclia!
tour.step10.title: API Keys
tour.step11.title: Become an Expert
tour.step2.content: Nuclia’s search engine suggests entities, semantic results, specific paragraphs and even classifications. Suggestions will help you to get even more specific results.
tour.step2.title: Find & discover
tour.step3.content: Use the filter tab to find even more specific results. Use it to find data without using the search bar.
tour.step3.title: Filter search results (coming soon!)
tour.step4.content: Manage your profile and account preferences. Create, edit or delete knowledge boxes.
tour.step4.title: User & Account preferences
tour.step5.title: Content options
tour.step6.content: Check if information is fully processed. Delete files. Create classifications and navigate the content using name entities.
tour.step6.title: Content management and entity discovery
tour.step7.content: Train domain-specific AI models using your knowledge box. Upload your own entities.
tour.step7.title: Training
tour.step8.content: Create and personalize a search widget that can be embedded in any app.
tour.step8.title: Widget
tour.step9.content: Manage which users can access the Knowledge Box.
tour.step9.title: User management
upload.audios_detected: We detected audio files. To continue, select the file and its language.
upload.invalid_image: Selected file is not a valid image
upload.once_uploaded: Once uploaded, you can see the status from the resource list page. When the resource status is green, it will show up in search results.
upload.select_file: Drop your file(s) or click here
upload.size_warning_1: Media files can not exceed {{ maxMedia }} and non-media files {{ max }}.
upload.size_warning_2: Files exceeding this size will not be uploaded
upload.takes_time: We needs some time to process the files. Feel free to close this dialog box and keep working.
upload.uploading_files: Uploading files. Feel free to use Nuclia in the meantime
upload.use_folder_as_labels.help: First-level folder is the label set name, subfolders are labels. If subfolders are nested, files will get multiple labels. Labels will be created automatically if they are not defined in the knowledge box yet.
upload.use_folder_as_labels.label: Use folder names as label names
validation.password_minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
